description: Mango and lime make this vegan kale-packed smoothie a crowd pleaser.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Pear,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Kale,Vegan,Mango,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Kale, Mango & Lime Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium pears, peeled, cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Add all of the ingredients to a high powered blender with two handfuls of ice and blitz until completely smooth, adding water as necessary.
